name: Availability.availableTime.availableStartTime
title: Availability.availableTime.availableStartTime
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Opening time of day (ignored if allDay = true)
element.definition: Opening time of day (ignored if allDay = true).
element.comment: The timezone is expected to be specified or implied by the context this datatype is used.
element.requirements: The opening time of day. Note: If the AllDay flag is set, then this time is ignored.
